title: REWOO Scope Transformer (Java)
description: Open Integration Hub transformer for the REWOO Scope API

transformDocumentFromOih.title: Transform document from OIH
transformDocumentFromOih.description: Transforms the OIH document to the corresponding REWOO Scope files

transformDocumentToOih.title: Transform to OIH
transformDocumentToOih.description: Transforms the REWOO Scope files to the corresponding OIH document
